translations: n．顶棒球：一种棒球技巧，击球员轻轻地触碰球，使其在内场滚动，而不是击出远距离。
· The batter successfully bunts the ball.
击球员成功地顶了棒球。
v．顶球：在棒球比赛中，击球员用球棒轻轻触碰球，使其在内场滚动。
· He bunts the ball to advance the runner.

sentences.sentence: The hitter farthest from the pitcher bunts for ahit-and-run to the outside of first base.
sentences.translation: 跑者跑向他们指定的目的地。 打者接近本垒板充分挥棒。 打者的短打采用打带跑战略，最远到一垒垒包外面。

sentences.sentence: Bunts accept waist plus seven points hubble-bubble sleeve design, tweed match with satin band, will woman flavour to supreme. Aureate buttons for nods eyeball place.
sentences.translation: 短打收腰加七分泡泡袖设计，粗花呢配以缎面镶边，将女人味推向极至。金色纽扣为点睛之处。
